attributes.action: scrap the proposed april increase in fuel duty.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
mr darling has proposed increasing fuel duty again in april.this petition asks him to reconsider.
the economy is at a tip point and could go into recession.citizens are being squeezed by high interest rates,and gas/electric prices fly upwards etc. enough is enough. jobs are now at risk.cancel this increase in duty chancellor.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
